page.title: 13VANDALISM
page.content: Vandalism is common in this area especially in play parks and public toilets.The most common piece of vandalism is graffiti.This is rude in some ways and silly in others. Vandalism isn't only silly writing but it is also ruining our district-For instance,ripping up flowers and pulling out young trees when they are newly planted. Teenagers are often the worst for vandalism because they think it is smart. The worst piece of vandalism is smashed bottles because someone might slip and hurt themselves. At our school we sometimes get the windows smashed and broken glass is left lying all over the playground. This is dangerous and could cause accidents.
